response.message:
I thought you were about 9 days late with this post, seeing \Drinkwater\ and a dog's mug right away.

Unrelated, why can't I comment on a post with my StackExchange profile, but instead have to use some bizarre method
@Nick T, That is a good idea, commenting on the StackExchange blog with one's StackExchage profile.
The blogging software is totally unrelated to StackExchange.  So there is no integration with user id's.
The Theoretical Computer Science link points to physics.
The blogging software is totally unrelated to StackExchange. So there is no integration with user id’s.
